description: 65+ line conversation with extensive small talk (weekend activities, TV shows, restaurants, office renovation). Only 1 real event buried in the noise: client demo next Friday at 11 AM.

events.title: Client Demo
events.reasoning: Alice proposes a client demo for next Friday at 11 AM in the big conference room. Both Bob and Carol confirm availability. Dave from engineering will also be invited.

mock_llm_response.summary: Found 1 event: client demo next Friday at 11 AM. The rest of the conversation was social chat and status updates with no scheduling.

notes: Reference datetime is Friday 2026-02-20, so 'next Friday' is 2026-02-27. 65+ lines of conversation with only 1 event. Tests ability to find signal in noise.
